name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Skilled Software Developer with over 10 years of experience specializing in backend systems and financial platforms. Proficient in **Kotlin**, **Spring Boot**, and **Python** for creating high-performance APIs and scalable services. Extensive knowledge in **Golang**, **PostgreSQL**, and various frameworks, ensuring efficient backend solutions. Experienced in integrating **AI-assisted development tools** and robust architectures, with hands-on expertise in building applications on **AWS** and **Azure**. Proven track record of impactful contributions in high-stakes environments with top-tier organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
